mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.student_id AS "student.id", a.course_id AS "course.id", a.score AS "score"
LEFT JOIN test_student student ON student.id = a.student_id LEFT JOIN test_course course ON course.id = a.course_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student_course( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, student_id, course_id, score ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{student.id}, #{course.id}, #{score} )
mapper.update: UPDATE student_course SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, student_id = #{student.id}, course_id = #{course.id}, score = #{score} WHERE id = #{id}
